flawed_nl_solution:
There are 250/25 = <<250/25=10.0>>10.0 bundles of potatoes.
So, 10.0 bundles of potatoes amount to $1.9 x 10.0 = $19.0.
There are 320/20 = <<320/20=16.0>>16.0 bundles of carrots.
So, 16.0 bundles of carrots amount to $2 x 16.0 = $23.0.
Hence, the farmer got $19.0 + $23.0 = $<<19.0+23.0=42.0>>42.0 in all.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32.0, not 23.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
